short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add buttons to save documents on MyCourses to Google Drive and Dropbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When viewing a file on MyCourses, Drive and Dropbox buttons will appear next to the regular Download button.

ChangeLog:
v1.2:
- All non-Microsoft files will work
- Microsoft files should work most of the time
- Buttons do not show up if the generated link won't work

v1.1.0:
- Fixed "broken" links for most preview-able files. The only files that sometimes might not work are .doc(x) and .ppt(x) files.

v1.0.1
- Fix for saving HTML files

v1.0
- Initial Release

For every change, check out the source on GitHub: https://github.com/Speenah/rit-mycourses-file-downloader
